items.sentence: Live your own life and don't meddle in other people's lives.
There are millions and millions of galaxies in the universe.
Our school offers a large number of after-school activities.
I wrote down everything I needed to buy on a scrap of paper.
It'll be faster and easier to do this the way Tom suggested.
Tom was a kindergarten teacher before he became a policeman.
Stop beating around the bush and just tell me what you want.
Are there any good places near here to listen to live music?
This fruit looks like an orange and tastes like a pineapple.
I know that I've met you before, but I can't remember where.
